member.name: T:Ellucian.Logging.EnterpriseLibraryLoggerFactory
member.summary: An implementation of the interface which creates instances that use the Microsoft Enterprise Library Logging framework as the underlying logging mechanism.

remarks.para: This facade logs messages via the Microsoft Enterprise Library Logging (EntLib) framework. log levels are mapped as follows:

SLF logger names are mapped to EntLib categories, with category names separated by commas. For example, a logger named "Integration, Service", will log to both the Integration and Service EntLib categories.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Logging.EnterpriseLibraryLoggerFactory.CreateLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a logger with the given name
member.param: The logger name.
member.returns: A logger with the given name.
